attributes.action: Rule Out the Possibility of UK Involvement & Denounce US Warmongering with Iran
attributes.additional_details:
War with Iran will lead to millions of innocent civilian deaths, adding to countless brutal & unfinished US invasions in the Middle East that bloodthirsty war hawks such as John Bolton have pursued for decades.

The Iranian government has been faithful to the Nuclear Agreement (JCPOA) & there is NO NEED FOR WAR. Any escalation will only worsen the situation & increase the risk of global terrorism.

UK citizens & Government MUST rule out involvement & denounce support for a US war with Iran.
attributes.background: Escalating tensions between Iran & the United States in the Persian Gulf are a worrying development for global geopolitics with consequences that can further destabilise the Middle East, Europe & other regions. The UK government must commit to standing against further US destablisation of the region
